intro: Carminatia tenuifolia, commonly known as the slenderleaf carminatia, is a species of flowering plant in the family Apiaceae. It is characterized by its delicate, narrow leaves and small, clustered white or greenish flowers. Native to certain regions of southern Africa, this plant typically grows in moist, shaded environments. It has a compact growth habit and is often found in rocky or forested areas. Due to its unique appearance and habitat preferences, it is of interest to botanists and conservationists.
